description:
New Listed Beautiful Two Bedroom Apartment in the Heart of Woodside, Queens, NY

The Apt is fully furnished and located near all Transportation. Close to Airports. Midtown 7 minutes via LIRR and 20 minutes via subway. Bus & Rail services within 2 minutes walk.  Continental, Indian & Chinese Food Restaurants, Pubs, Pharmacies, within walking distance.

All the big world famous stores like Mecys, Bloomingdale, Brook Brothers, Sears, Best Buy, P.C. Richards, CostCo and others are 20-30 minutes drive.

Woodside is a working- and middle-class residential and commercial neighborhood in the western portion of the borough of Queens in New York City. It is bordered on the south by Maspeth, on the north by Astoria, on the west by Sunnyside, and on the east by Elmhurst and Jackson Heights. Some areas are widely residential and very quiet, while other parts, especially the ones around Roosevelt Avenue, are more urban.

Subway: 7 Train to Midtown both local & Express

LIRR: Direct trains to Penn Station or Long Island

Bus: Many buses to all over including LGA

Taxi: Taxis are always available on Roosevelt Ave and 61st st
name: Beautiful 2 Bedroom Apartment Woodside, Queens, NY
review: This is an affordable family friendly unit with quick access to Manhattan by train (about 20-25 minutes). Clean with new linens on the beds. We would stay here again. Thank you Erfan.
